about_the_game:
From beautiful landscapes, to mythical beasts. Explore and discover even more of the breathtaking world of Kainga in an exclusive 27 page digital artbook.

The digital artbook shows some stunning scenes from Kainga with unique behind-the-scenes text describing the thought behind the development of Kainga.

Take a glimpse at the sketches and drawings that inspired the creation of this unusual game and read about the reasons behind Kainga’s unusual gameplay.

A selection of Kainga themed Desktop Wallpapers are also included as an extra bonus for you to use as you wish.

The downloaded content can be found in the main game’s folder:
SteamLibrary/steamapps/common/Kainga/CollectorsEdition

A selection of Kainga themed Desktop Wallpapers are also included as an extra bonus for you to use as you wish.

short_description: From beautiful landscapes, to mythical beasts. Explore and discover even more of the breathtaking world of Kainga in an exclusive 27 page digital artbook. Some Kainga wallpapers are included as an extra bonus. Including versions scaled for desktops and mobiles.
